attributes.action: Understand the lack of funding under the mental health care 117 after care support.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to our attention that people who are taken off section 37 - 41 of the mental health act do not get the on going support with care management under the 117 act. This is because supporting bodies feel it is a choice. This is not a game of Russian roulette but it is a matter of life and death for the individual who falls through the net. This is not just for the safety of the individual who needs the support but the safety of others.
